meanings.definition: Ornamental work of fine wire formed into delicate tracery
meanings.sent1: The jewelry box was adorned with beautiful filagrees.
meanings.sent2: The artist crafted intricate filagrees on the metal frame.
meanings.sent3: The filagrees on the gate looked like tiny vines growing in metal.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a way that resembled delicate filagrees.
meanings.sent5: The filagrees on the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She filagreed the cake with frosting swirls.
meanings.sent2: The tailor filagrees the dress with lace trim.
meanings.sent3: He filagrees his notebooks with doodles during class.
meanings.sent4: The chef filagrees the plate with chocolate sauce.
meanings.sent5: They filagree the walls with colorful paintings.

meanings.definition: An ornamental design of delicate scrolling intertwined with metal or wire
meanings.sent1: The antique mirror featured intricate filagrees along its edges.
meanings.sent2: The gate was decorated with ornate filagrees that caught the eye.
meanings.sent3: The filagrees on the chandelier looked like twisted vines.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was embellished with silver filagrees that shimmered.
meanings.sent5: The filagrees on the balcony railing added a touch of elegance.
